mapper.insert: insert into menuinfo (menu_id, text, state, url, pid, iconCls, start_time, end_time) values (#{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{text,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iconcls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update menuinfo set text = #{text,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, iconCls = #{iconcls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select menu_id, text, state, url, pid, iconCls, start_time, end_time from menuinfo
